segments.text: Oh , hi , Mary , come on in . Any problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I forgot to ask you , though . How long did you want the place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , well , that might be a problem . I usually only sign one year leases .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , one year would be fine , too . I ’ m not planning on leaving the area anytime soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if it ’ s not a problem . Then here you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just let me look at it quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and don ’ t worry about the security deposit . If everything ’ s all right when you move out , you ’ ll get it back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . Great . Just sign and date it here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Thanks . You can move your stuff in tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
